name: Eggxplode: Hatch egg bombs!
description:
Lead the chicken through dangerous levels and crush enemies using egg-bombs and power-ups. Difficult levels will test your skills and turn you into the ultimate eggxpert!

Features:
- Challenging levels
- Beautiful effects and particles
- Come back daily for a "spin-to-win" in-game currency or power-ups
- Compete with other players in the Game Centre
- Haptic Feedback
- Optimised for any iOS device
- Collect diamonds to purchase power-ups!
- Tap to flap left
- Tap to flap right
- Drop egg bombs and flap away from danger!

Discover the eggciting journey inside Eggxplode! Plant egg-xplosive eggs, find the hidden keys and capture the flag to complete levels. Lead the chicken through dangerous levels and crush whatever stands in your way

Love this game? Share your screenshot on social media using #eggxplode hashtag.
